name: Catalonia Atenas
description: Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath. The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV. The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor. The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
description: Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status. All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available. Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
description: Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s restaurant serves typical Catalan food using fresh market produce. B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
description: Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

name: Catalonia La Maquinista
description: Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away. The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars. Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes. Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away. As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

name: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
description: Located 250 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV. This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors. Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, bathrobe and slippers. The elegant restaurant serves creative Mediterranean cuisine and room service is available. There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya. Passeig de Gràcia is 400 metres away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
description: Formerly known as NH Rallye, the NH Barcelona Stadium hotel is in a convenient location in the Les Corts area of Barcelona. Several local points of interest are easily accessible within walking distance such as the FC Barcelona stadium and museum, El Corte Inglés, and the L'illa Diagonal shopping mall. The metro station Les Corts with links to the city center is only a few minutes away. Contemporary comforts such as air-conditioning, Wi-Fi and satellite TV come as standard in each of our 106 modern guest rooms. Other rooms offer a spacious sitting area and a coffee or tea maker. A delightful breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests every morning. Made-to-order hot meals and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. The Ristorante Don Giovanni by renowned chef Andrea Tumbarello with its typical Italian flavors and top-quality seasonal products or enjoy an aperitif with some snacks at the Gastrobar right next to the restaurant. Our friendly staff is on hand to offer recommendations for excellent local restaurants for additional lunch or dinner selections. We are pleased to host events both large and small. The NH Barcelona Stadium has seven meeting rooms which hold up to a maximum of 250 guests. With advance notice, our special events services team can assist with menu planning, equipment and services.NH Hoteles

name: El Avenida Palace
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 605, 08003 Barcelona
description: El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns. Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965. The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe. The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
description: Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace. Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Barcelona Condor
description: In the district of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, enjoy the tranquility of the upper area and the proximity to several Barcelona landmarks. It is a 25-minute walk from downtown and 10 minutes from Diagonal and Gràcia neighbourhood. The railway is a 3-minute walk and reaches downtown in 10 minutes. It has a gym with views of Tibidabo and a breakfast with local and seasonal products. We will make you feel at home!accorhotels.com

name: NH Sants Barcelona
description: The NH Sants Barcelona hotel, previously named NH Numancia, is located within walking distance of Sants station in the heart of Barcelona’s financial district. Situated just a few steps away from the trade fair, it is at the center of Barcelona’s financial district. Guests will find Camp Nou, the home ground of the Barcelona soccer team, and Gaudi’s Casa Batlló a few minutes’ distance from the hotel. Our bright, contemporary selection of 203 guest rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and minibars, with some suites overlooking the Olympic Village. The larger upgraded suites provide guests with a balcony or terrace and a sitting room with a sofa bed. A daily breakfast buffet is served and includes made-to-order hot dishes upon request. The NH Sants Barcelona restaurant, serving fresh Catalan cuisine in a modern dining area, is open for lunch and dinner. An á la carte menu, vegetarian, and children’s options are also available. For additional requests, our professional and friendly staff is ready to provide NH Sants Barcelona guests with an outstanding experience. We also have 4 meeting rooms available, which can hold up to 200 people.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Born
description: Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away. The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season. A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby. Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

name: Ilunion Almirante
description: Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas. Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel. Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: Holiday Inn Barcelona - Sant Cugat, An IHG Hotel
address: Carrer Del Danubi, 24,Sant Cugat Del Vallès, 08174 Barcelona
description: Welcome to Sant Cugat del Vallès The Holiday Inn Barcelona Sant Cugat is a modern 4-star hotel. The city hotel is located on Carrer del Danubi in the Sant Cugat district. Built with care and attention to detail, the hotel is of great value for families, business travellers, and all other discerning guests. You are guaranteed to feel at home at the Holiday Inn Barcelona Sant Cugat. Our comfortable rooms are equipped with a flatscreen TV and a desk. All rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom with a shower. Our city hotel has event and meeting rooms for your convention or conference in Sant Cugat. A fitness room is available at our hotel. The reception is staffed 24 hours a day. With a delicious breakfast buffet our guests are ready to start the day and discover Barcelona. There are two train stations within 2-4 km, Rubi and FGC - Sant Cugat. The Sant Cugat Shopping Centre is very close to the hotel, as are several parks and a hiking area such as the Torrent dels Alous. You can arrive Barcelona by train in only 30 minutes. From here you can reach: Camp Nou several parks Teatre Joventut Palau Blaugrana many restaurants & bars port of Barcelona Aquarium Maremagnum shopping centre Barceloneta district with its city beaches Barcelona-El Prat Airport (BCN) is only 31 km from the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel SB Glow
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Hotel SB Glow Sup rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow Sup. Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Hotel SB Glow Sup.

name: Hotel Primero Primera
description: Offering stylish rooms with free, high-speed Wi-Fi and iPod docking stations, Primero Primera is located in the Sarrià district. 5 minutes’ walk from Les Tres Torres FGC Station, this boutique hotel is set in gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Primero Primera has contemporary décor. All rooms have tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and minibar. A buffet breakfast is served in the Primero’s restaurant "Planta Baja" or on the charming terrace. The Sarrià district features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes by train. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel Sofia Barcelona, In The Unbound Collection By Hyatt
description: Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment. Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace. Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away. Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot We accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. For pets. Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed. Pets must comply with current health regulations. They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas. €100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee) €25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

name: NH Barcelona Eixample
description: NH Barcelona Eixample, formerly known as NH Máster, is set in the residential Eixample district. The lively Passeig de Gracia with designer shops and trendy restaurants is only a 15-minute walk away, as are Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and Casa Milà. Close to the Hospital Clínic metro stop, guests have direct links to the Sagrada Familia Church, Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona exhibition center. The Sants train station is only two stops away, with direct access to the airport and city surrounding areas. NH Barcelona Eixample has 81 modern soundproof rooms all equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. There are three superior rooms and a Junior Suite that has a large terrace and street view. A large breakfast is offered daily with a varied selection of local and international goods. For fresh snacks, a quick drink or some ice-cream, guests can use the self-service 24/7 Open Bar. Around the hotel, guests can find some of the best gastronomical offerings in the city, including lively tapas bars, a-la-carte restaurants and lovely lunch spots. For meetings, there are 2 meeting rooms with capacity for up to 100 people. Coffee breaks and snacks can be arranged by NH Barcelona Eixample staff.NH Hoteles

name: The Hoxton Poblenou
description: Set in our favourite corner of Barcelona, The Hoxton, Poblenou gives you a real flavour of local life. We've got 240 rooms, a rooftop pool and taqueria, a bright and airy lobby, a sunny pizza terrace and slice shop, and a multi-functional basement space.Our 240 rooms suit all kinds of stays settle into a Cosy, Roomy, Biggy or Homey. Terracotta floors and faded florals make you feel right at home in the Med, whilst statement headboards, Roberts radios, and handcrafted artworks add that homely Hoxton touch. Nobody leaves here hungry. Enjoy poolside tacos and margaritas up on the roof at Tope, or tuck into Detroit-style pizza at Four Corners, a terrace, all-day restaurant and slice shop. Whatever the occasion, we've got the space. Our bright and airy Apartment is meeting and events space like no other, with three differently sized rooms, a pantry kitchen-come-bar, and its own dedicated street-level entrance.iHotelier/iStay

name: Ilunion Auditori
description: Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout. All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter. Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city. Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: Catalonia Catedral
description: The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden. The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge. The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free. The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto
description: Family run Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto of Barcelona, would like to welcome you to our hotel, where the relaxed atmosphere stems from the courtesy and friendliness of the staff guarantees a convenient and comfortable stay whether your visit is on business or leisure. Convenient hotel’s location to the public metro & bus stations is only minutes away from the Airport of Barcelona-El Prat-Josep Tarradellas, Cruise Pier, International Exhibitions and Trade Fair, and the city center. Enjoy a quality night’s sleep in one of our 100 bedrooms from a large suite, comfortable double and triple rooms or cozy up in a cute single room. All of them come with superb bathrooms, rainforest showers, free Wi-Fi, tea and coffee facilities, satellite TV. Discover exceptional dining in our Gran Mercat Restaurant with a selection of delicious dishes of a traditional Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine from our executive Chef or enjoy a pre-dinner drink, cocktail or glass of cava and feel like at home in our lounge and cafeteria Mercabar with their comfortable Chester sofas. Before going to the Airport do not forget to choose one of our breakfast options available every morning; hearty and healthy buffet breakfast or an early bird express breakfast, all of them at a very affordable price. Additional on-site amenities include a newly refurbished multi-functional meeting rooms suitable for business functions or family events; free access to our Alfa Gym, which offers a variety of top-quality training equipment. Moreover, it offers an indoor pool and sauna room. All you need to increase your feeling of well-being! Our complimentary shuttle service running between both airport terminals and the hotel between 5 a.m. and 10:30am and from 18:15 to 12:30 a.m. The hotel boasts secure on-site parking for guests. Our hotel sincere aim is to offer an impressive and highly pleasing experience after of before a transatlantic flight and pre/post-cruising.bestwestern.com

name: Hesperia Barri Gotic
description: Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 100 metres from the port and 500 metres from Las Ramblas. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute stroll from the Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gotic. Its bright, modern rooms offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. They also have air conditioning or heating and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. You can find a range of lively bars in the surrounding streets. Barcelona Aquarium and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are 800 metres away.

name: Sercotel Porta Barcelona
address: Avinguda de la Generalitat de Catalunya, 2-6, 08960 Barcelona
description: This bright, modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free sauna and hot tub, and a convenient location on the A-2 motorway, just 8 km from central Barcelona in the suburb of Sant Just Desvern. Sercotel Porta Barcelona is linked to the centre of the Catalan capital by road and tram, with journeys taking between 10 and 30 minutes. The hotel is also well located for those visiting the legendary Camp Nou football stadium – home to FC Barcelona. After a day of business or sightseeing, unwind with a session in the gym or sauna. You can then cool off in the hot tub or by enjoying the sunshine on the sun terrace. The hotel’s Mediterranean restaurant offers breakfast from Mondays to Sundays, and dinner from Mondays to Fridays.

name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: With the arrival of Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio hotel, the brand's first venture into the city, an opulent destination is now available for locals and professionals seeking luxurious accommodations. Positioned in the midst of the high technology business area and upcoming 22@ district in Poblenou neighborhood, guests can immerse themselves in the lively atmosphere of the area. This ultra-modern establishment represents a remarkable symbiosis of technology, creativity, and sustainability, boasting a human-focused design supported by cutting-edge technology that ensures both comfort and user-friendliness. Our meticulously designed guest rooms and suites offer stunning views of the city's iconic Sagrada Familia or the mesmerizing sea, providing an ideal setting for both relaxation and work. The dining offerings encompass the all-day Alcachofa, a seafood-minded restaurant, along with Za'atar Pool & Bar, an establishment that serves Middle'terranean cuisine.Marriott

name: Hotel España Ramblas
description: Hotel España is situated in a 19th-century building in central Barcelona, within 100 metres of the Ramblas and Liceu Theatre and 200 metres from Boqueria Market. Its Mediterranean restaurant is run by famous chef Martín Berasategui. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout. The stylish and elegant rooms include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. They also come with a modern bathroom. Hotel España offers a variety of drinks and cocktails at AlAire rooftop terrace bar. There is also a small swimming pool. Liceu Metro Station is 100 metres away and the Gothic Quarter is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana
address: Gran Via de Las Corts Catalanes 322, 08004 Barcelona
description: Hotel Barcelona - Gran Via Plaza España is a modern design hotel with a bright central courtyard. It offers free Wi-Fi and a convenient location, next to Barcelona's Plaça Espanya. The modern rooms at the Barcelona - Gran Via Plaza España feature a private bathroom, and free mineral water for the first night. All are soundproofed, with flat-screen TVs, and air conditioning. The Barcelona Via is set next to the Fira Exhibition Centre, at the bottom of Montjuic. This hill is home to a castle, the National Art Museum, and the Magic Fountain. Espanya Metro Station is 150m from the hotel. The historic center of Barcelona and the famous Ramblas are just a few steps away. A direct bus service to the airport stops in Plaça Espanya, near the hotel. Breakfast is available at an additional cost; the hotel also offers a large bar and a refined restaurant with a gastronomic proposal that is aroused with live music and other events every week.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Neri Relais & Chateaux
description: This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings. Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona. Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace. Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument. Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

name: Le Méridien Barcelona
description: Our luxury hotel in the Barcelona CIty Center offers 231 rooms and suites with the atmosphere from the city. The rich Barcelona’s artistic heritage inspires your experience while enjoying the local culture with all main attractions within walking distance. Discover our Unlock Art Programme, explore Palau Güell with your room key or indulge in our gastronomic options. Roasted coffee aroma greets you as soon as you enter the lobby. With views of Barcelona’s renowned Las Ramblas, CentOnze Restaurant offers a market to table experience focused on bringing the freshest products to the fore, paying tribute to the traditional Spanish cuisine. After a long day of work, the Signature Cocktail Bar is the perfect place to relax or network while enjoying our Sparkling cocktails and Petit Plates, our signature tapas. If you prefer to nourish your mind and body, enjoy our Explore Spa Studio, an oasis in the heart of Barcelona. You're welcome to bring your furry friend along as our 5-star hotel is pet-friendly.Marriott

name: NH Barcelona Entenza
description: NH Barcelona Entenza, formerly known as NH Sants Center, is located in one of the city’s financial and business hubs: Les Corts neighborhood. While it is a quiet area of Barcelona, the hotel is well-connected to the city center and other destinations by metro. The Entença metro station is a short walk away and in 10 minutes on foot guests can reach Barcelona Sants station, with high-speed AVE trains and direct links to the airport. Some close-by attractions also include the famous FC Barcelona Camp Nou Stadium and Plaza de España with singing fountains. For shops and restaurants, head to the Avenida Diagonal 10 minutes away on foot. NH Barcelona Entenza has 48 bright rooms with large windows, all of which have access to free Wi-Fi. The Superior rooms and Junior Suite have coffee and tea making facilities, as well as complimentary bathrobes and slippers. A varied breakfast buffet is served daily. On-site there is a coffee bar, while NH Sants Barcelona and NH Collection Barcelona Constanza offer delicious international meals at their restaurants and are only a few minutes away on foot. There are 3 compact meeting rooms for business travelers.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Actual
description: In the centre of Barcelona’s famous Modernist district, this sophisticated hotel is an ideal base for your discovery of the city’s famous shops and stylish bars – enjoy views of Gaudí’s architecture. Relax in the calm interiors of the Actual’s rooms. Surf the web on the free wireless provided and watch your favourite shows on the LCD screen. Prepare for the day ahead with a fantastic buffet breakfast served in the Hotel Actual’s cafe. Here, you can later enjoy a refreshing drink in the bar area. You can also rest your legs in the stylish lounge and chat to other guests while you help yourself to complementary hot drinks. The Actual has been carefully designed to harmonise with the beautiful architecture of its surroundings. Admire a balance of old and new. You can enjoy sleek, modern furniture and contemporary design which features dark wood and glass details. This is cleverly contrasted against traditional, Belle Époque fixtures in the ceilings.

name: Hesperia Barcelona Sant Just
description: Hesperia Barcelona Sant Just is situated a 20-minute drive from the centre of Barcelona. It features a gym, restaurant and free Wi-Fi access. The spacious rooms at the Hesperia Sant Just have king-size beds and flat-screen TV’s. All rooms offer a pillow menu. There is also on-site car rental. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Barcelona’s El Prat Airport and offers a free service for printing boarding passes. Barcelona city centre can be reached in 20 minutes, via the B-23 Motorway. People under 18 years of age can only stay if they present an authorization granted by one of their parents or legal guardians, or if they are accompanied by them

name: Hotel Villa Emilia
description: This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV. The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk. Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Catalonia Park Güell
address: Pg. Mare de Déu Del Coll, 10, 08023 Barcelona
description: Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell. Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar. The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city. The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics. There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

name: Casa Mathilda
description: Located 350 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Avenue, Casa Mathilda is a small hotel set in a elegant historic building. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and stylish décor. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with international channels, a safe, minibar and wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe and free toiletries. Some rooms have terrace access and some offer city views. There is a vending machine for cold drinks and snacks. Luggage storage is also available. Diagonal Metro Station is 350 metres from the property, while Gaudi’s La Pedrera is 250 metres from the hotel. The Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk from Casa Mathilda and the famous Las Ramblas Boulevard is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Icon Bcn
address: Carrer de Roger de Lluria, 21, 08010 Barcelona
description: This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower. Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability. ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

name: Ilunion Barcelona
description: Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views. This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request. Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available. Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away. Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost. Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel. Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

name: Petit Palace Museum
description: This stylish design hotel is situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. The chic rooms include free WiFi. Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer. Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Pódium
description: Stay in one of Barcelona’s loveliest neighborhoods at the NH Collection Barcelona Pódium. Only steps away from the Arc de Triomf, the hotel enjoys a central location and is a short 15-minute walk to the luxury stores along Passeig de Gràcia and the bustling Las Ramblas. Stroll through the Parc de la Ciutadella or go there for an invigorating run. The Arc de Triomf metro and train station is right by the hotel, providing direct links to everything in the city. The harbor and zoo are also nearby. NH Collection Barcelona Pódium has 140 stylish rooms, some of which come with balconies. Each has its own Nespresso machine, a pillow menu and premium mattress for perfect sleep. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. For relaxation throughout the day, head to the rooftop pool or to the gym and sauna. A lavish breakfast with fresh delicacies including Catalan specialties is served daily. In the afternoons and evenings, choose between a contemporary Mediterranean restaurant or head to the rooftop tapas bar. In the winter, unwind with a drink at the ground-floor bar. For your special events or even for a wedding, reserve our spectacular terrace or one of the 8 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Roma
description: Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus. There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar. Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel. The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered. Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

name: INNSiDE By Meliá Barcelona Apolo
description: INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi. Refurbished in 2017, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings. Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

name: Catalonia Castellnou
description: Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area. There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià. Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab. The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Continental Barcelona
description: In the heart of Barcelona, the Hotel Continental Barcelona is located on Las Ramblas, next to Pl. CatalunyaThe Continental Barcelona offers 40 fully equipped rooms with: Fridge, Microwave, Charger for iPhone, Android and USB plug, Iron board, hairdryer, direct telephone, free high speed wifi, Safety box, HD Television with national and international channels, air conditioning with individual climate control, and tropical fan.We offer all our Guests very special amenitie. A free and 24/7 hours open buffet were to enjoy a drink, a coffee, a beer or some snacks.iHotelier/iStay

name: Catalonia Port
description: Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar. The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom. Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona
description: This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi. Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony. A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested. Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year. The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions. The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

name: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
description: Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site. Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site. Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Claris Hotel & Spa Gl
description: Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection. Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door. The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork. The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce. The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
description: Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area. Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection. A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

name: Catalonia Gran Via Bcn
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes 550, 08011 Barcelona
description: Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station. You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner. You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

name: Fairmont Barcelona Rey Juan Carlos I
description: Set in 25,000 square meters of breathtaking 19th century gardens and revealing an unparalleled view of the stunning Barcelona skyline, this luxurious urban hotel provides guest with a tranquil retreat in the heart of Barcelona, Spain`s celebrated second city. With a central location on the prestigious Avenida Diagonal, Fairmont Rey Juan Carlos I is surrounded by major attractions such as the famous Camp Nou stadium, the Barcelona Polo Club and the financial district, in addition to vibrant restaurants, bars and shopping streets that have made Barcelona a world-class destination. With its 432 elegantly appointed guest rooms and suites, engaging service and glamorous ambience, Fairmont Rey Juan Carlos I will ensure the most memorable stay.Fairmont

name: Hesperia Del Mar
description: Situated on the seafront in Diagonal Mar, the Hesperia Barcelona del Mar (formerly Hesperia del Mar) features stylish rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is a 5-minute walk from the CCIB and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. Air-conditioned rooms at Hesperia Barcelona del Mar come with flat-screen TV, safe, and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. The Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter are only 5 km from the hotel. Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Catalonia Plaza Catalunya
description: Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app. The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes. Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages. Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
description: Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals. The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel. The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

name: Me Barcelona
description: Set in Barcelona and with Somorrostro Beach reachable within 2.7 km, ME Barcelona offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides nightclub and room service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. ME Barcelona features some units with city views, and each room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available every morning at the property. At ME Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from ME Barcelona, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel SB Icaria
description: Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace. Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

name: Arai Aparthotel
description: Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona. Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 950 metres away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel
description: Welcome to the first Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants in Spain. Located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter Kimpton Vividora Hotel is a relaxing escape and vibrant hub for locals and travelers alike. The hotel sits right next to Las Ramblas and is within walking distance of the Barceloneta beach. An ideal location with other nearby attractions that include the city’s shopping epicenter and the Gothic Cathedral. Tucked away on a pedestrian street in Barcelona’s city center, our lifestyle design hotel is conveniently 20 minutes away from El Prat airport and 10 minutes from both the cruise port and Sants train station. Enjoy sightseeing plans to Sagrada Familia and La Boqueria but also experience authentic Barcelona by walking the streets of the city. The accommodations accentuate the Mediterranean and contemporary design combined with luxurious comforts, superlative service and standout amenities. Join us at our evening social hour, discover the city with our complimentary bikes and longboards and taste local gastronomy at our Fauna restaurant, Got Coffee & Cocktails or Terraza de Vivi. Don't leave your furry friend at home because we're a pet-friendly hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Derby Barcelona
description: Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access. The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar. Drinks and light meals are served in the Derby’s coffee shop, The Times. L'Illa Shopping Centre offers a range of restaurants. Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
description: Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi. The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport. All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail. Do you already know the Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner. The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology. This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
address: Carrer de Deu i Mata 69-99, 08029 Barcelona
description: Created by Pritzker prize-winning architect Rafael Moneo, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza exudes calm elegance. A 15-minute drive from the city center, it is situated in the Les Corts financial district of Barcelona. This is the perfect choice for business travelers, with the Axa Auditorium right next door. Landmarks, such as the FC Barcelona Camp Nou is also close by. NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has 308 rooms, including 7 Junior Suites and 1 Suite. Each has flat-screen TVs, a Nespresso machine and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy contemporary design with polished wood, glass and large windows, along with modern comforts, such as a rain-effect shower and a pillow menu. Breakfast will be the perfect start to your day with a large spread of options, including eggs prepared-to-order and gluten-free dishes. Lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at GoXO Restaurant and accompanied by a cocktail. Enjoy these on a beautiful terrace. For business travelers, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza is the perfect choice, with 11 rooms holding up to 800 guests. To unwind, head to the outdoor 7th floor pool or visit the fitness center and the spa.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero
description: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop. There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods. All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
description: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette. All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk. The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access. The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Gran Hotel La Florida
description: Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa. Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony. Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available. The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: NH Barcelona Les Corts
description: The NH Barcelona Les Corts hotel is a mere 6-minute walk from L’Illa Diagonal Mall and less than a kilometer from Les Corts metro station which provides links to the city center. Additional local points of interest include Las Ramblas, Camp Nou, and Santa Eulalia Cathedral. For buses to the beautiful beach, guests need only walk to the stop located 5 minutes away from the hotel. All of the our 81 bright and contemporary guest rooms come with modern comforts such as free Wi-Fi, wood floors, flat screen TVs, and minibars. Larger, upgraded room types also offer coffee and tea makers, and extra space for an additional bed. Each morning a scrumptious breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests. Made-to-order hot dishes and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. For delicious lunch and dinner selections, our friendly staff will gladly provide recommendations for highly-rated local restaurants. Our professional 24-hour front desk staff are ready to respond to guest requests for additional amenities such as providing extra beds and wake up service.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Rigoletto
description: The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box. A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work. Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona
description: Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service. The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas. Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Catalonia Mikado
description: This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi. The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops. The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina. Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

name: Hotel Continental Palacete
description: Stay in the refined elegance of this classic hotel, set in a renovated, 19th-century palace surrounded by classy boulevards right in the heart of Barcelona. As soon as you enter the Continental Palacete you will experience a feel of luxury thanks to the exquisite Baroque decor. This elaborate interior features priceless chandeliers and elaborate frescoes, and combines with modern facilities such as free Wi-Fi throughout to provide a unique setting for your visit. Start each day with a delicious hot and cold breakfast. The Hotel Continental has a varied food and drink buffet on offer throughout the day and evening. The hotel lies on the elegant Rambla de Catalunya, just a 5-minute walk from the citys main square of Plaa Catalunya. The surrounding streets are full of Barcelonas distinctive architecture, smart restaurants and exclusive boutiques.iHotelier/iStay

name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
description: Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes. The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo. Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available. You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

name: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel
description: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is a modern base when in Barcelona and is close to everything the area has to offer. Some of the popular facilities at this elegant 4-star hotel include a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Couples on a romantic getaway will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, an in-room safe and a desk. They are all soundproofed and include heating. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel's on-site restaurant offers Spanish-inspired dishes, which can enjoyed on the outdoor terrace. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Sercotel Amister Art Hotel is also located near the area's popular restaurants and bars, plus EAE Business School is a 10-minute walk away. It is within a 20-minute walk of Sants Estacio Railway Station and Barcelona Sants Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Hotel Casa Bonay
address: Gran Vía de Les Corts Catalanes 700, 08010 Barcelona
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. It also offers a coffee bar, a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Casa Bonay features a 24-hour reception, plus a sun deck and live music. For added convenience, it offers a roof garden, a shuttle service and a safe. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a rain shower and a mini bar. All have movies-on-demand, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests of Hotel Casa Bonay can enjoy a unique dining experience at the trendy bar and trendy bistro. Dining options at the hotel include Satan's Coffee and Chiringuito. Those staying at the property can also sit down to a buffet breakfast every morning. Local attractions close to Hotel Casa Bonay include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Placa de Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia. It is within a 20-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia Train Station and Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Catalonia Park Putxet Hotel
description: Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout. The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer. You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available. The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

name: Isabella's House
description: Set in Barcelona, 3 km from La Pedrera and 3 km from Sants Railway Station, Isabella's House offers a restaurant, city views and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Isabella's House.

name: Gaudi Hotel
description: Located just 50 metres from the famous Las Ramblas in Barcelona, Gaudi Hotel features a shared terrace with views of the Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available. The hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station. You can visit many of the city’s attractions on foot. The Boqueria Market is 450 metres from the hotel. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk away. All air-conditioned rooms at the Gaudi Hotel have a private bathroom and a TV. Some have a private balcony and safe. Rooms are modern, with wooden floors, and some offer excellent views of the city or Palau Güell. A continental breakfast is served in the Gaudi’s restaurant. There is a bar and a snack bar. There is a 24-hour front desk, and a laundry and ironing service are available. Guests also have free use of the hotel's 2 computers with internet access.

name: El Palauet Royal Suites
description: Located in a Modernist building, El Palauet Royal Suites features a rooftop spa with spectacular city views. It offers elegant, modern suites with free Wi-Fi. El Palauet Royal Suites’s spacious suites include 2 bedrooms with private bathrooms, a spacious living room and a fully-equipped kitchen including a hob, microwave, small fridge and a dishwasher. Some include a balcony. All suites come with 2 bottles of water and a platter of apples, replenished every day, as well as a 380 ml bottle of Spanish wine and Wallpaper guide to Barcelona. This luxury hotel delivers breakfast to the rooms. Main restaurants and bars can be found on Barcelona’s elegant Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, where it intersects with Diagonal Avenue. El Palauet Royal Suites offers a personal assistant service. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost and guests can rent cars at the hotel.

name: W Barcelona
description: Step inside. See for yourself. Designed by world-renowned architect Ricardo Bofill, W Barcelona sets the scene for a spectacular stay. W Barcelona is a luxury hotel offering a combination of luxury and comfort in each of its 473 fabulous guestrooms and suites. This 5-star hotel is located on the beachfront along the famous Barceloneta Boardwalk. Each guest room and suite provide panoramic views over the Mediterranean Sea and the city of Barcelona.Marriott
